name: the odd door
description:
WARNING LOUDE NOISE AND BRIGHT FLASHING IMAGE 

------

They told you to walk up the hill, they told you that you'd find something, something to send a call. An invitation to our space.

listen to the storm, witness it, witness them.

------

this is a walking sim

------

Move with WASD / ZQSD

look around with the mouse

interact with left mouse button

hold left mouse button to take pictures 

(they're saved in the game's folder)

------

the odd door is heavily inspired by some work : 

  - The static by Pol Clarissou

 - a discord comment by Rayzones

 and my need to make less video games

made as a PS1 halloween jam submission  and a late 7DFPS submission
